title: FiveThirtyEight - Wikipedia
snippet: The site's new owner, Disney, hired G. Elliott Morris to develop a new model. On September 18, 2023, the original website domain at fivethirtyeight.com was closed, with web traffic becoming redirected to ABC News pages, and its logo was replaced, with the name 538 used instead of FiveThirtyEight.

title: FiveThirtyEight Founder Nate Silver Leaving ABC News as Disney Layoffs Continue
snippet: Founded in 2008, FiveThirtyEight ... FiveThirtyEight: Nate Silver’s Political Calculus. ESPN acquired the brand in 2013 before it moved over to Disney sister company ABC News in 2018....

title: The End of an Error: FiveThirtyEight Is Shutting Down – PJ Media
snippet: Stats guru Nate Silver founded FiveThirtyEight, once the darling of the left-wing polling establishment, in 2008 before licensing it to The New York Times. ESPN later acquired it and finally transferred it to ABC News.

title: Nate Silver - Wikipedia
snippet: In 2018, the Walt Disney Company transferred the FiveThirtyEight site from the ESPN division to the ABC News division. In April 2023, amid widespread layoffs at Disney and ABC affecting FiveThirtyEight, Silver announced that his contract with ...

title: ABC News Takes Over Nate Silver’s FiveThirtyEight
snippet: ABC News Takes Over Nate Silver's FiveThirtyEight
